unnormalised: Arre, Mr. Sharma, that was quite a Bollywood-esque wedding, wasn't it? Smt. and Shri Kapoor really outdid themselves. I heard even the local MLA, Mr. Patil, showed up! Wonder if "Bhai" Khan also sent his regards. BTW, did you see Dr. Verma there too? Chalo, good times all around!
normalised: Arre, Mister Sharma, that was quite a Bollywood-esque wedding, wasn't it? Srimati and Shri Kapoor really outdid themselves. I heard even the local M L A, Mister Patil, showed up! Wonder if "Bhai" Khan also sent his regards. By the way, did you see Doctor Verma there too? Chalo, good times all around!
